meta-review.comment: Just Cause 3 is the ultimate playground for those who love to create chaos and destruction. With its stunning display of cause and effect, outrageous chain reactions, and untarnished fun, this game is a dream come true for players who have a knack for free-form mayhem. Despite some performance bugs and technical issues, the game offers some of the best open-world tools ever, allowing players to create their own explosive experiences. It may not be an action masterpiece, but if you have the creativity and tolerance to make your own fun, Just Cause 3 will provide endless hours of entertainment.
